cards.flavor:
“Vastuum hasn't seen a starry sky in a dozen years. What use is an astrolabe now?”
—Nivia
cards.name: Abandoned Astrolabe
cards.text:
{T}: Each opponent mills a card.
{3}, {T}: Exile three target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Draw a card.

cards.name: Abandoned Excavation
cards.text:
Abandoned Excavation enters with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Abandoned Excavation: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: The Source still lies within these walls.
cards.name: Aethanis, the Fallen Capital
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{C}{C}{C}{C}, {T}: Target player exiles a card from their hand or a nontoken permanent they control, then loses 1 life for each card exiled with Aethanis, the Fallen Capital. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Aethanis Conservator
cards.text:
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Exile target creature an opponent controls until Aethanis Conservator leaves the battlefield.
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Aethanis Conservator leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Untouched by time. Unwavering in purpose.
cards.name: Aethanis Leylinker
cards.text:
Vigilance
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: It watched its civilization die, it watches Vastuum decay, and it will keep watching after nothing remains to see.
cards.name: Aethanis Sentinel
cards.text:
Flying
When Aethanis Sentinel enters, each player may scry 1.

cards.flavor:
“A dozen years have passed, yet my people's guardians seem untouched by the Fall.”
—Nivia, Last of the Aethanis
cards.name: Aethanis Strider
Aether Conductor
cards.text: Whenever Aether Conductor attacks, put a charge counter on it, then you may put a permanent card with mana value equal to or less than the number of charge counters on Aether Conductor from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

cards.flavor: Nivia hid away, studying how to disable the Source.
cards.name: Ancient Shelter
cards.text:
When Ancient Shelter enters, up to one target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.name: Angel of Dismay
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Dismay enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each tapped creature your opponents control.
Creatures your opponents control with -1/-1 counters on them can't attack or block unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures they control.

cards.name: Antiquity Seeker
cards.text: When Antiquity Seeker enters, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library, then journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor: The unending sunlight empowers every dunekite even as it slowly kills them.
cards.name: Ashen Dunekite
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
When Ashen Dunekite enters, creatures without flying can't block this turn.

cards.name: Biramous Entity
cards.text: When Biramous Entity enters, search your library for a permanent card with the same name as another target nontoken permanent you control. Reveal it and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
“The Source is gone. Vastuum is safe. Why then do I feel I've failed?”
—Karn
cards.name: Bitter Redemption
cards.text: Return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand for each creature that died this turn.

cards.flavor: When duststorms blot out the sun and your eyes are full of sand: that's when the wyverns strike.
cards.name: Blind Wyvern
cards.text:
Flash
Flying

cards.flavor: The mutagenic debris that spread across Radaran killed or twisted most of the native Minotaurs. Those that fled harbor a deep anger at the loss of their ancestral home.
cards.name: Bloodrage Brawler
cards.text: When Bloodrage Brawler enters, discard a card.

cards.flavor: Adapted to skim across the ocean's poisonous vapors, they can glide for weeks without landing.
cards.name: Brackcliff Drakes
cards.text:
Flying
{1}: Brackcliff Drakes gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Karn arrived seeking traces of Phyrexian oil. Instead he found a chance to redeem his mistakes.
cards.name: Buried Ruin
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: To a convoy on the ground, standing in the shadow of a griffin provides a sense of safety.
cards.name: Caravan Skyrider
cards.text:
Flying
When Caravan Skyrider enters, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The Faultless are not the only ones who prey on the sick and wounded.
cards.name: Carrion Divers
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast for each -1/-1 counter among creatures your opponents control.
Flying, lifelink

cards.flavor: One perfect mortal is chosen. A shadow of hope for the rest of the chattel.
cards.name: Chosen of the Faultless
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Tap target creature you don't control.
• Put a -1/-1 counter on target tapped creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: We scour every abandoned town for a fleeting opportunity.
cards.name: Claim What Remains
cards.text: Discard a land card: Add {R}, then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.flavor: Foug twists every choice to his benefit, leaving only yourself to blame.
cards.name: Consign to Failure
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.”

cards.name: Consumption Tyrant
cards.text:
Trample
When Consumption Tyrant enters or dies, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, you draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.name: Convoy Forerunner
cards.text:
When Convoy Forerunner dies, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.
• Search your library for a Nomad card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top of it.

cards.flavor: Karn needed a guide, Luma agreed. But only if he'd tell her his stories.
cards.name: Convoy Laggu-Rider
cards.text:
Lifelink
{5}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Council of Vaya
cards.text:
When Council of Vaya enters, each player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever Council of Vaya or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Evaldi's Geneshifters work tirelessly to create a piece of Vastuum that will withstand the end of days.
cards.name: Crafted Exogene
cards.text: When Crafted Exogene enters, each opponent mills four cards.

cards.name: Deathraider Elite
cards.text:
Dash {B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
Menace
Whenever Deathraider Elite attacks, other Hyenas you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Nomads travel from ruin to ruin, seeking shelter and anything worth trading.
cards.name: Debris Surveyors
cards.text: When Debris Surveyors leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.

cards.name: Desperate Animist
cards.text: Whenever Desperate Animist attacks, you may waste a nonwastes land you control. If you do, Desperate Animist gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.name: Destari Blightwing
cards.text:
Flying
When Destari Blightwing dies, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you don't control, then put a -1/-1 counter on any number of other target creatures with a -1/-1 counter on them.

cards.name: Destari Skylord
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Other creatures you control have vigilance.
Tap two other untapped creatures you control: Destari Skylord gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The Faultless punish what they see as imperfection in the world.
cards.name: Disciple of the Faultless
cards.text: When Disciple of the Faultless enters, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.flavor: “Nothing is out there, and the nothing is spreading.”
cards.name: Doomed Undertaking
cards.text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Exile target creature.

cards.flavor: Hidden under the sands, they emerge only in the few hours of twilight.
cards.name: Dusk Dancer
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you scry 1 and each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: The sands whisper to those lost within them.
cards.name: Dust Enigma
cards.text:
When Dust Enigma becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
While choosing targets as part of casting a spell, players must choose at least Dust Enigma if able.

cards.name: Dustborn Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Exile three instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard: Return Dustborn Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“The righteous use ‘morality' to fill their empty lives. What will be left when it fails them?”
—Foug
cards.name: Ego Collapse
cards.text: Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand.

cards.flavor: The sun never truly sets on Vastuum. Each day ends in murky twilight, favored by mutants and other horrors.
cards.name: Embraced by Dusk
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace.

cards.flavor: With the young, comes hope.
cards.name: Endtimes Hatchling
cards.text:
Flying
{6}{C}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“This land is carrion. We thrive on carrion.”
—Vlad-Shi
cards.name: Endtimes Hunter
cards.text:
Reach
{6}{C}: Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Endtimes Monstrosity
cards.text:
Defender
{6}{C}: Until end of turn, Endtimes Monstrosity can attack as though it didn't have defender and can't be blocked.

cards.flavor: Elves were once entirely reclusive, but The Fall has left no room for such luxuries.
cards.name: Endtimes Pilgrim
cards.text: {6}{C}: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“Did Radaran warp the harpies? Or were they always so vile?”
—Sephius, Ruin Scholar
cards.name: Endtimes Steward
cards.text:
Flying
{6}{C}: Distribute two -1/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.name: Enigmatic Constructor
cards.text:
Triggered abilities from other sources you control trigger an additional time.
Whenever an activated ability of a permanent you control is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: As the gnolls gathered to attack, Karn witnessed a display of Luma's celestial power.
cards.name: Enrobe in Light
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Enrobe in Light enters, tap all creatures your opponents control.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

cards.name: Eon Overwatch
cards.text:
Flying
When Eon Overwatch enters, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. That permanent's owner can't cast spells with the same name as that permanent until your next turn.

cards.flavor:
“Perhaps this is what we deserve.”
—Alliah, lone bandit
cards.name: Eradicator Engine
cards.text: Whenever Eradicator Engine enters or attacks, destroy target nonland permanent with the least mana value or tied for the least mana value.

cards.flavor: The only certainties on Vastuum are death, despair, and endless sand.
cards.name: Erode to Nothing
cards.text: For each of X target creatures, put a number of -1/-1 counters on that creature equal to its toughness minus 1.

cards.flavor: Every drop of mana drained from Vastuum, every wisp of magic wasted is collected in The Source: A battery of planar proportions.
cards.name: Essence Scatter
cards.text: Counter target creature spell.

cards.name: Eternal Wanderer
cards.text:
When Eternal Wanderer enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)
Whenever you put a journeyed card into your hand, you may pay {2}. If you do, journey.

cards.flavor: “Our world yet lives.”
cards.name: Evaldi, Genesis of Hope
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

cards.name: Evaldi's Harmonizer
cards.text:
Flash
If a permanent would be put into your hand from the battlefield, you may put that card on the bottom of your library instead. If you do, you draw two cards.

cards.name: Evaldi's Masterpiece
cards.text:
Whenever Evaldi's Masterpiece attacks, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Dash {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Evaldi's Muse
cards.text:
Whenever Evaldi's Muse or another nontoken creature you control enters, you gain 2 life.
When Evaldi's Muse leaves the battlefield, create two 1/1 green and blue Elf creature tokens.

cards.flavor:
“The resilience of the Geneshifted warrants further study.”
—Evaldi
cards.name: Evaldi's Search
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land or Mutant card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

cards.flavor: Continued use of magic drains away what little mana Vastuum has left.
cards.name: Exiled Channeler
cards.text: {T}, Waste a nonwastes land you control: Add one mana of any color. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.flavor: In the blasted wilderness of Zerul, you adapt or you die.
cards.name: Exogene Prowler
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Exogene Prowler gains your choice of vigilance, deathtouch, indestructible, or trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: One of the Geneshifters' most successful creations.
cards.name: Exogene Spitter
cards.text: When Exogene Spitter enters, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: They have nowhere to go, and yet they roam. They have no need to feed, and yet they hunt.
cards.name: Fall Lurker
cards.text: Deathtouch, lifelink

cards.name: Falltouched Emergence
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Create two 2/2 black Zombie Mutant creature tokens with deathtouch.
• Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor: Just natural enough to feed. Not natural enough to stop.
cards.name: Falltouched Hunger
cards.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature an opponent controls. Then target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

cards.name: Falltouched Predator
cards.text:
{2}: Falltouched Predator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: Some people say the Faultless are just a cult to feed the last surviving vampires. Those people are also very nourishing.
cards.name: Faultless Bloodhunter
Field of Ruin
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles their library.

cards.flavor: There's a reason raiding parties never grow too large.
cards.name: Fierce Infighting
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn and fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: Find of a Lifetime
cards.text: Discard your hand. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal seven nonland cards. Put those cards into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor:
“Aim for the eyes.”
“Which ones?”
cards.name: Flareshot Bow
cards.text:
Equipped creature has vigilance and reach.
Equip {2}

cards.name: Flawed Undertaking
cards.text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Put two -1/-1 counters on target tapped creature.

cards.flavor: You'll see it coming. That won't help.
cards.name: Fluorescent Sprinter
cards.text:
Whenever Fluorescent Sprinter deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Dash {2}{G} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Forlorn Firstspear
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Forlorn Firstspear attacks, you may waste a nonwastes land you control. If you do, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.name: Foug, Indulgent Broker
cards.text:
[+1]: Target opponent reveals all the cards in their hand except one. You choose a card revealed this way. That player discards that card.
[-3]: Destroy target creature unless its controller sacrifices two other creatures.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, draw two cards unless target opponent sacrifices two creatures or pays 6 life.”

cards.flavor:
“When I take the Source, this world will be saved. Isn't that what you want?”
—Foug to Nivia
cards.name: Foug's Quandary
cards.text: Any opponent may pay 5 life. If no one does, you draw three cards.

cards.flavor:
“Nature acts on a pendulum between adaptation and acceptance.”
—Evaldi, Genesis of Hope
cards.name: Gene Gorger
cards.text: When Gene Gorger enters, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
“Each carries our hopes and dreams. May they survive where we cannot, and may we join them in time.”
—Timari, Geneshifter Adept
cards.name: Geneshifted Goliath
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature or land you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The elves have turned to science, adapting nature in order to save it.
cards.name: Geneshifted Warbler
cards.text: When Geneshifted Warbler enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Mutant card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: “Evaldi has seen our destiny. It is my job to prevent it.”
cards.name: Geneshifter Adept
cards.text: When Geneshifter Adept enters, until your next turn, up to one target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Mutant with base power and toughness 1/1.

cards.name: Geneshifting
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “At the beginning of each opponent's end step, exile this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Geneshifting to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.”

cards.name: Getting Lost
cards.text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor: Gnoll whelps seek food and havoc. Those that survive to adulthood are known as deathraiders.
cards.name: Gnoll Deathraider
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Hyena get +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Gnoll Raidleaders
cards.text:
Whenever Gnoll Raidleaders attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Dash {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.flavor: Deadly, but cowardly.
cards.name: Gnoll Ravager
cards.text:
Gnoll Ravager can't attack or block alone.
Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Goresand Marauder
cards.text:
When Goresand Marauder enters, target creature can't block this turn.
Dash {3}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

changes: 2021-06-05 — Now wastes on etb instead of next end step.
cards.name: Goresand Remnant
cards.text:
When Goresand Remnant enters, waste a nonwastes land you control. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

cards.flavor: Goresand once was home to dozens of settlements. As the land died and the mutants encroached, many of these collapsed. From the chaos rose a single warlord: Grin. Now his raiders and the gnoll packs gnaw on what remains.
cards.name: Goresand Wardriver

cards.flavor:
“The Fallen took Ori last night. Her green cloak disappeared under twisted flesh as I ran. I have no food and little water, but I still have the relic.”
—Journal of a Ruin Seeker, part 3
cards.name: Grasp of the Fallen
cards.text: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

cards.name: Grievous Confrontation
cards.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so. Until end of turn, whenever a creature blocks that creature, put a -1/-1 counter on the blocking creature.

cards.name: Griffin Taming
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Griffin Taming enters, create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

cards.flavor:
“Survive. Let nobody hold you back.”
—Alliah, lone bandit
cards.name: Grim Determination
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.”

cards.name: Grin, Scourge of Goresand
cards.text:
Whenever Grin, Scourge of Goresand attacks, when next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn with mana value 3 or less, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Grin's Reaver
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Grin's Reaver deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

cards.flavor:
“Every day the wastes take more of our world. Let's take a little back.”
—Evaldi
cards.name: Growthblazers
cards.text: When Growthblazers enters, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

cards.flavor: “The blood of a dying world is potent indeed.”
cards.name: Harvester of Vigor
cards.text: {T}, Waste a nonwastes land you control: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.flavor: Packmothers fear the hateseers and their savage magic even as they rely on them.
cards.name: Hateseer Elder
cards.text:
Hyena spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever another Hyena you control enters, Hateseer Elder deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.

cards.flavor:
“Here it almost feels safe. Like the world makes sense again.”
—Samul, dust nomad
cards.name: Holdout Settlement
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: Over a dozen years, Foug implemented a plan to doom all of Vastuum.
cards.name: Hopeless Predicament
cards.text: At the beginning your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature with the greatest toughness or tied for greatest toughness among creatures your opponents control.

cards.flavor:
“The ancient lords of Vastuum return, heralding the end of days.”
—Evaldi, Genesis of Hope
cards.name: Horizon Eater
Hostile Undertaking
cards.text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Hunter's Tenacity
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Hunter's Tenacity enters, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach.

cards.flavor: Gnolls often raid not for wealth or supplies but because they simply enjoy it.
cards.name: Huntscent Pillagers
cards.text: Whenever Huntscent Pillagers attacks, if you control another Hyena, Huntscent Pillagers gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“Aethanis? There is nothing left for anyone, and there is nothing left of anyone.”
—Nivia to Karn
cards.name: Incandescent Rain
cards.text: Incandescent Rain deals 1 damage to each creature. Put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

cards.flavor: “I'll make sure it strikes twice.”
cards.name: Insistent Lightning
cards.text:
Insistent Lightning deals X damage to any target.
You may cast Insistent Lightning from your graveyard if you have no cards in hand. If you do, if it would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Instincts of the Pack
cards.text:
Each creature spell you cast has dash. The dash cost is equal to its mana cost.
Whenever a creature you control enters, Instincts of the Pack deals 1 damage to each opponent. If that creature is a Hyena, this deals 2 damage to each opponent instead.

cards.flavor:
“If they were once human, they aren't now.”
—Alliah, lone bandit

cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{6}, {T}, Sacrifice Irradiated Amalgam: Create two tapped 2/2 black Zombie Mutant creature tokens with deathtouch.

cards.name: Isolation Zone
cards.text: When Isolation Zone enters, exile target creature or enchantment an opponent controls until Isolation Zone leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Karn, Heart of Guilt
cards.text:
[+2]: Until your next turn, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {4} for each of those creatures.
[-1]: Each opponent exiles a card from their hand, a permanent they control, and the top card of their library.
[-4]: For each other nonland permanent, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
[-10]: Put any number of non-Karn permanent cards from your hand, graveyard, or exiled with Karn onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Know the Way
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor: Nomad settlements survive by relying not just on each other, but also on their hardy laggu mounts.
cards.name: Laggu Outrider
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, Laggu Outrider gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Landscape Decay
cards.text: Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then waste two nonwastes lands you control. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.name: Last of Us
cards.text:
Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest.
Journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.name: Leave to the Sands
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Leave to the Sands enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.flavor: The marvels of Aethanis lie mostly intact—save for their delicate magics, which have all leeched into the surrounding wastes.
cards.name: Left to Time
cards.text: Destroy X target enchantments.

cards.flavor: It begins with burns, fever and the inability to cast spells. It ends with bleeding, death, and the body dissolving into ash.
cards.name: Lethal Dose
cards.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker with mana value 4 or less.

cards.flavor: The Fall shrouded Aethanis in a never-ending storm, swirling with lethally unstable mana.
cards.name: Leyline Feedback
cards.text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

cards.flavor: In the bones of the plane grows a potent marrow.
cards.name: Leyline Feeder
cards.text: {2}, Waste a nonwastes land you control: Leyline Feeder gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.name: Leyline Reaper
cards.text: When Leyline Reaper enters, you may waste two nonwastes lands you control. If you do, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.name: Leyline Router
cards.text: When Leyline Router enters, you may waste two nonwastes lands you control. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.name: Life Desecrator
cards.text: When Life Desecrator dies, you may waste two nonwastes lands you control. If you do, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

changes: 2023-11-01 — Upkeep trigger changed to end step trigger.
cards.flavor:
“It waits for orders that will never come. In a way its fate is even more tragic than ours.”
—Sephius, Ruin Scholar
cards.name: Liminal Observer
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Knowing what happened won't fix the world. But at least it will bring me peace.”
cards.name: Lore Investigator
cards.text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Lore Investigator: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: The machines follow their old purpose, oblivious that their creators are no more.
cards.name: Lost in the Past
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn. Return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Lost in the Past.

cards.name: Luma, Guiding Star
cards.text:
[+1]: Luma, Guiding Star deals 1 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it can't attack or block until your next turn.
[-3]: Create three 1/1 white Nomad creature tokens with vigilance, then journey three times.
[-6]: Luma, Guiding Star deals 20 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.

cards.name: Luma's Acolyte
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card or put a journeyed card you own in exile into your graveyard. If you do, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor:
Luma arrived on Vastuum as a child, rescued from the desert by the convoy who would become her family.
Each day she looks at the stars only she can see, knowing she could leave this failing plane, but doesn't.
cards.name: Luma's Kindred

cards.flavor: This world no longer cares whether you live, die, or rise again.
cards.name: Malformed Rebirth
cards.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
“Nothing living can approach Aethanis.” said Nivia.
“That won't be a problem.” replied Karn.

“Fire works great on mutant scum, and gnoll scum, and nomad scum.”

cards.text: When Oasis Seeker enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor: There will be no righteous charge or heroic last stand. It is one day after another, and the courage to go on.

When Path of Caution enters, journey three times. (Exile the top three cards of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.name: Path of Resilience
cards.text:
When Path of Resilience enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor: No matter how far her people must travel, Naomi will see them reach safety.

cards.name: Supply Raid
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Put that card on top of its owner's library, then they journey. (To journey, exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor:
“Get in, then get out. That's the way we've always done it.”
—Ori, relic hunter
cards.name: Survey What's Left
cards.text: Exile two target permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Survival Gear

cards.flavor: Sandsharks were here before The Fall, but their temperament has only gotten worse since.
cards.name: Territorial Sandshark
cards.text:
Menace
When Territorial Sandshark dies, it deals 2 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: The Fall of Aethanis
cards.text:
When The Fall of Aethanis enters, if it was cast from your hand, destroy all creatures.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may waste a nonwastes land you control. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)

cards.flavor: The Shi-Fang will stalk you, toy with you, take everything you have, kill everyone you know, and only then will they finally eat you.
cards.name: The Pack Feasts
cards.text: Create two 2/2 red Hyena creature tokens.

cards.flavor: With her own creation, Nivia chose to doom one world instead of hundreds.
cards.name: The Source
cards.text:
Indestructible
{T}, Waste a nonwastes land you control: Add three mana in any combination of colors. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)
As long as you control seven or more lands that can produce {C}, you may play cards you own from outside the game.

cards.flavor:
“All that remains of the Aethanis civilization is the sickness that erodes the world and their machines that defend it.”
—Samul, dust nomad
cards.name: Timeless Custodian
cards.text:
Vigilance
Timeless Custodian can't have counters put on it.

changes: 2021-06-05 — Now wastes on etb instead of next end step.
cards.name: Tradeway Remnant
cards.text:
When Tradeway Remnant enters, waste a nonwastes land you control. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.name: Tradeway Scholar
cards.text: When Tradeway Scholar enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.flavor: Hearing Karn's stories fueled Luma's desire to see the multiverse.
cards.name: Travel Together
cards.text: Once each turn, when one or more creature tokens are created under your control, create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.

cards.flavor: The hardships of Vastuum's present bring pain, but it's the emptiness of its future that brings despair.
cards.name: Twilight Depths
cards.text:
When Twilight Depths enters, each opponent loses 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor: Nightfall never comes, but they do.
cards.name: Twilight Screechers
cards.text: When Twilight Screechers enters, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature with the greatest toughness or tied for greatest toughness among creatures an opponent controls.

cards.flavor:
“Weaknesses? Sometimes, when you run, they go after your laggu instead.”
—Alliah, lone pathfinder
cards.name: Twisted Endurance
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Not all flying mantas are friendly.
cards.name: Umbral Glider
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Umbral Glider attacks, return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: On the brink of extinction, there is nothing left to lose.
cards.name: Unbridled Antoch
cards.text: When Unbridled Antoch enters, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.flavor: Karn and Nivia approached The Source, and before it stood Foug.
cards.name: Uneasy Encounter
cards.text:
Tap up to three target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor: Together, one step at a time.
cards.name: United in Survival
cards.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Nivia made The Source, hoping to uplift the entire world to a new age.
cards.name: Unprecedented Genius
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

cards.flavor:
“The Source doesn't pull energy from nothing. It drains it from other planes. Is that really the legacy you wish to leave?”
—Foug to Nivia, Pre-Fall
cards.name: Unstable Relic
cards.text: {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

cards.name: Valley Carver
cards.text:
Valley Carver can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
{1}{G}, Discard Valley Carver: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Vaya, Arbiter of Perfection
cards.text:
Creatures your opponents control enter tapped and with an additional -1/-1 counter on them.
At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature that player controls and tap it.

cards.flavor: “Witness how they flock to us.”
cards.name: Vaya's Subjugator
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature an opponent controls, create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.

cards.name: Vlad-Shi, Packmother
cards.text:
Trample, haste
Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
Whenever a Hyena you control dies, if it entered this turn, return it to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The glyphs could be crucial equations, lists of casualties, or just more graffiti.
cards.name: Wall of Mysteries
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Mysteries enters, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
“What luck! We found a relic.”
—Journal of a Ruin Seeker, part 2
cards.name: Wander the Ruins
cards.text:
Create two 1/1 white Nomad creature tokens with vigilance.
Journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)

cards.name: Warpath Minotaur
cards.text:
When Warpath Minotaur enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)
Each player must attack with at least one creature each combat if able.

cards.flavor: Rayak whispered: “Do unto others as the world has done unto you.”
cards.name: Warped Worshipper
cards.text: Whenever Warped Worshipper deals combat damage to a player, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Way of the Raider
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Way of the Raider enters, journey. (Exile the top card of your library face up. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a journeyed card you own into your hand.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.

cards.flavor:
“I made it home. I miss you, Ori.”
—Journal of a Ruin Seeker, part 5
cards.name: Wayfarer's Destination
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle. Create a 1/1 white Nomad creature token with vigilance.

cards.flavor:
“The weak and old die first, but the rest of us are not far behind.”
—Lundus, convoy storemaster
cards.name: Wither Away
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
• Destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.name: Wurm's Wake
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{9}{G}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Wurm's Wake: Create Wurm of World's End, a legendary 15/15 green Wurm creature token with trample and hexproof.

cards.name: Zerul Mangler
cards.text:
When Zerul Mangler enters, you gain 2 life.
Dash {2}{G} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Instincts of the Pack
cards.text:
Each creature spell you cast has dash. The dash cost is equal to its mana cost.
Whenever a creature you control enters, Instincts of the Pack deals 1 damage to each opponent. If that creature is a Hyena, this deals 2 damage to each opponent instead.

cards.name: Sandwarp
cards.text:
You may pay {U} and waste three nonwastes lands you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. (It becomes Wastes, a basic land with “{T}: Add {C}” and no other abilities or types.)
Counter target spell.
